text:
I am trying to upload files to the `filemanager` with the CLI tool but I keep getting a weird error:
```[ERROR] Uploading file "/<local_path>/filemanager/resources/text.pdf" to "resources/text.pdf" failed
[ERROR] Unable to upload "/<local_path>/filemanager/resources/text.pdf". The post failed because "resources/text.pdf" was not found in portal <my_portal_id>.```
Note: <local_path> and <my_portal_id> are just strings I added to obfuscate the real strings.
I am running: `hs filemanager upload filemanager/resources resources`
any idea what could be happening?
Iâ€™m not able to replicate this on my end. Are you using the latest version of the HubSpot CLI?
